law.catch_line: Denial of license due to previous revocation.
law.text: Any gasoline dealer or special fuels dealer having a license revoked for the violation of any of the provisions contained in KRS Chapter 138 may, within the discretion of the department, be denied the issuance of a gasoline dealer or special fuels dealer license, and any such licensee shall not have an interest in any such license, either disclosed or undisclosed, whether as an individual, partnership, corporation or otherwise.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 366, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 285, sec. 30, effective August 1, 1988.
